players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I saw Bob last night and he was alive. I think the Mafioso might be Charlie since he remained silent."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice and found her to be the Mafioso. I will continue to gather evidence."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
